body: The Prosecutor General's Office in Russia expressed its interest in the fact that the biggest domain registration company in Russia "RU-Center" reserved 60,000 domain names within first hours after open registration and later sold 25,000 of those in closed auctions, newspapers Kommersant.ru reported.
original_body: The Prosecutor General's Office in Russia expressed its interest in the fact that the biggest domain registration company in Russia "RU-Center" reserved 60,000 domain names within first hours after open registration and later sold 25,000 of those in closed auctions, newspapers Kommersant.ru reported.
title: Russia: New .РФ Domains Could Be Sold Illegaly
